SAINT.Name: Synaxis of the 'Three Hierarchs' - Basil the Great, Gregory the Theologian and John Chrysostom (Transferred from Wednesday)
Synaxis of the 'Three Hierarchs' - Basil the Great, Gregory the Theologian and John Chrysostom (Transferred from Friday)
Translation of the relics of the Hieromartyr Ignatius the Godbearer, Bishop of Antioch (+ 107)
[The feast of St Ignatius may be transferred to Friday]
Martyrs Romanus, James, Philotheus, Hyperichius, Abibus, Julian and Parigonius, at Samosata (+ 297)
Martyrs Silvanus the Bishop, Luke the Deacon and Mocius the Reader (+ 312)
Venerable Lawrence of the Caves of Kiev, Bishop of Turov (+1194)
Holy Hierarchs of Perm: Gerasim (+ c. 1441), Pitirim (+ 1455), and Jonah (+ 1470)
